  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="1825" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="1825" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.22</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="24023">24,023</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="2456"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Tobacco Vanille</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. <b>Tobacco Vanille</b> was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Gillotin. Top notes are Tobacco Leaf and Spicy Notes; middle notes are Vanilla, Cacao, Tonka Bean and Tobacco Blossom; base notes are Dried Fruits and Woody Notes. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html" target="_blank"                     Overemphasis on certain notes may not appeal to everyone
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">87</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">355</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May become boring over time
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">77</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">372</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Linear scent with lack of complexity
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Reminiscent of cheap vanilla candles or room sprays to some
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="1825"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.96.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tobacco-96.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tobacco Leaf</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.321.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Spicy-Notes-321.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Spicy Notes</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 4.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85008085084786; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.135.jpg" style="width: 3.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cacao-Pod-135.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cacao</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8404579286951; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 2.975rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.346.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tobacco-Blossom-346.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tobacco Blossom</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.93851021513145; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.230.jpg" style="width: 3.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Dried-Fruits-230.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Dried Fruits</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woody Notes</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="1825"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='e11eaec03e4645e69d05f04700897d2d916' slotpayload='{"ct":"WZMxYytS6UYV92Gz7fSli43ImDtOIAufTI5fydA4HMo5iOH3gmuBIF1Zz0xfHRvIJLrhDCHJN0qm4CPH1esKPSlGSzrHDiJtUXMCehT1e9j3f1hEFykbLxQAZlCrFm3vkV3\/EWd+9drdx3k8rSgtRu0HXy2WKgoi9NTxHmlX34shkIMLPA7KxYtu54KcwxiD9rC8Ho9rDu9SPwYkRfr7Ono89J98Vr9YS6mJQec82souv8WQTX0N7gBBHuN9gkZJYNBH6ER0D6TcjJFpYUH40URotcx8Q\/V3TeC6NsIQI8TMPR4hfuwT+JtZr4A3aJus","iv":"070db9ab66dfabd410a2aeb5fa41fb3a","s":"0c8f09f08afed1b7"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

        </a>

        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            03/24/24 12:11
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">5</span>
</div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371945" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beansfragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2349287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2349287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beansfragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2349287">Beansfragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733428634" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a 48/50ml bottle that I’m selling for 210$ price is negotiable I like the scent but I got it as a gift for my birthday and I don’t like it insanely private message me if your interested</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2371945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2371945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371774" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HecateZeusIsis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490835"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490835.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HecateZeusIsis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490835">HecateZeusIsis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733418176" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like wet henna and cloves to me……strange</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2371774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2371774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370772" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733341439" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing short of amazing, smells like a bottled holiday, sweet spicy and cozy. I was initially thinking since I have Tobacco Honey that it would be redundant to try this but not at all l, quite different obviously the syrupy sweet honey isn’t here, but a smooth vanilla that’s sweet but not in your face with it.<br />
<br />
 The tobacco smells crisp and a little boozy and works perfect with the vanilla and spices. There is a cool menthol sort of note in the background I pick up now and then with a slight fruitiness I just love the way it all works together to create this super cozy and sweet experience. <br />
<br />
Performs very well for a Tom Ford I get multiple hours of a pretty strong projection and get about 5-6 with a small to medium, not too loud but noticeable throughout the day. I wouldn’t even be opposed to getting a genuine bottle but this stuff is quite expensive and I hear there’s some great dupes of this out there so I might check some out instead and save $150+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2370772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2370772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhantomBelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhantomBelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narcotica/Narco-Oasis-84576.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84576.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narco Oasis"title="Narco Oasis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 07:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably my favorite winter fragrance from Tom Ford, very easy reach and I can spend 5+ hours in the spiced honey-like warm scent bubble. Truly a love from me, can't recommend it enough. 10/10 unisex, also a good layering scent. Purchased from: Sephora</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2367079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2367079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367010" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NicuJmekerul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NicuJmekerul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283863">NicuJmekerul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its just overhyped, it doesn't smell at all like vanilla or tobacco , all i can smell is a tea i used to have , cinnamon and chai and maybe a bit of honey,that's all i get. Not a big fan , be sure to smell the fragrances before you buy. The smell is rather mature and definitely not a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2367010"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2367010#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

Send me a message though my profile please if so, thank you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2365311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2365311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2363421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1719003">CreatureOfTheAbyss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Less aromatic-woody/tobacco-vanilla and more potpourri. I think it's the dried fruits maybe? The tobacco also creates a hay-like quality that I'm not totally in love with. Tobacco Vanille needs a much-needed revamp, a part deux for the people who are underwhelmed with the original.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2363421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2363421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monipod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781065.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monipod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Promises-Promises-94977.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94977.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Promises, Promises"title="Promises, Promises"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781065">monipod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so glad I tried this on skin before buying a full bottle. On paper, it is delightful. I worried that it leaned too masculine for me, but felt it was unisex enough after a few sniffs on paper. I sprayed an arm with it yesterday and I couldn't believe the difference. With my body chemistry, an odd smell came through. Not awful but still repulsive to me. If I tried hard enough, I could ignore it somewhat, but it was certainly no longer something I wanted to own. Someone else said 'banana' and someone else said 'rotten'. I think there's some fermented element in there. Dates? <br />
I'm not that wild about tobacco so I'll continue to enjoy Stora Skuggan's Azalai instead for the dried fruit, incense experience.<br />
Definitely not a blind buy, or even a tested-on-paper buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2362456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2362456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudebro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1392247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudebro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247">dudebro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 19:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Y'all are gonna think I'm crazy. hear me out: <br />
<br />
Lately I've been *obsessed* with Initio's Rehab, especially that creamy, late drydown. I can't get enough of it. <br />
<br />
Now that we're in the cooler months I'm wearing my favorite holiday fragrance: Tobacco Vanille.<br />
<br />
I swear the the spicy/creamy lactonics of Rehab share gorgeous similarities with the spicy/cocoa/chai vibe of Tobacco Vanille.<br />
<br />
The best part? Rehab in the morning layers beautifully over Tobacco Vanille from the evening prior. <br />
<br />
They don't share very many similar notes, but there is something about that spicy creaminess that makes me love both Rehab and Tobacco Vanille.<br />
<br />
Happy Thanksgiving, everyone 🙏</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2361326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2361326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360754" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amen! Hallelujah!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amen! Hallelujah!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859198">Amen! Hallelujah!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get minimum vanilla, and somewhat tobacco. Given the tobacco is mentioned first in the name it should be more tobacco-ey, but for me it's more spicy on a slight whiff of vanilla background in the opening, that quickly dissipates within 10 - 15 minutes on my skin. I mean vanilla is there but not as prominent as the spices, dried fruits and tobacco. It is really well mixed and blended scent because I can also distinctly tell tonka bean and cacao in it. Overall due to the overload of sweet and creamy notes the dry down muddles down to a sweet vanilla, banana flavored, sugar, cocoa and  cinnamon garnished rice pudding or any other kind of yellow puddingy kid's meal/snack. Something you put in a mixer bowl from a Dr. Oetker bag and mix with warm milk. I guess what I'm trying to say is that it is a very gourmand fragrance. LOL! The dry down feels almost lactonic as oppose to powdery to me. Although there is a powderiness to it too. It's a really very complex scent. I love it as a feel good calming, balmy scent. Would I wanna wear it specifically? No, I can't think of an occasion for it. Unless you wanna walk around smelling like Christmas. It's up there is the same ballpark as Ameer Al Oudh Intense Oud by Lattafa, only Tom Ford is more fruity and Christmasy.<br />
P.S. I strangely get a strong cherry vibe later in the dry down. Must be the dried fruits or something. And to be fair, vanilla is still present in the dry down on a molecular level... So here's my correction of y previous statement that vanilla dissipates quickly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2360754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2360754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360557" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cherrycreampuff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314956"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314956.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cherrycreampuff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314956">cherrycreampuff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent of fresh tobacco, rum and raisin chocolate, Christmas pudding, boozy vanilla and gingerbread. Whilst all these notes evoke warmth, there is a cool and fresh aspect to this perfume, like the vanilla liqueur has been poured over ice. Super opaque, extremely long lasting, with an incredible sillage. Absolutely stunning on a cold winter’s night. Best worn with a fur coat and red lipstick, or a smokey eye and motorcycle boots.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2360557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2360557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359970" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="memery1010"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2217355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="memery1010" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217355">memery1010</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 12:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first Tom Ford scent. I was really hoping it would indeed be a unisex scent, and I think it still could be, depending on the person. <br />
<br />
The mental picture it conjures for me is a '40s mustachioed man in a maroon smoking jacket. The sweet, rich and very clean tobacco scent pulls through beautifully. It isn't overwhelming, and it lasts a long time. I like it a lot, but regrettably I think I would prefer smelling it on my husband. My features are too feminine to fit the tone of this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2359970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2359970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2299132">Ismellgoodheaux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A good fragrance, just doesn’t smell like tobacco to me and not enough vanilla for me. Theres something slightly rotten in it at its core that I hope is just because this is from a bad batch of this fragrance. It smells like a chai tea, and is definitely more feminine leaning in my opinion but not something I would want to smell on my girlfriend more like something I would give to a mature woman in my life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I smell less vanilla and tobacco and more spices... nutmeg and cinnamon especially. Perfect for Thanksgiving</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2356896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2356896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356320" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Recherth Robert"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903840"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903840.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Recherth Robert" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Intensely-52802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903840">Recherth Robert</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance delivers what it promises. Its tobacco and vanille. Beautiful scent, sweet, good for cold and very powerful. Good performance, long lasting. Its a high quality fragrance, both scent and bottle with sprayer. The tobacco makes it masculine imo. Its classy, works better on older more experienced guys. Ita not gonna suit everybody, including me, im just not a big fan of tobacco, but this fragrance is still a really good one. A bit overpriced tho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2356320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2356320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think the most important perfume that brought the reputation of the Tom Ford brand in the perfume community to its current level is Tobacco Vanille. If I remember correctly, Tom Ford is a brand founded in 2006. It immediately released Tobacco Vanille under the Private Blend series in 2007. It is a very brave attempt for a newly founded brand to release a Private Blend series. <br />
<br />
Tobacco Vanille seems to be the successful fruit of this brave risk. Tobacco Vanille is a very brave, ambitious and flamboyant perfume. Just like Tom Ford's brave Private Blend release. But there is no arrogance in Tobacco Vanille's bravery. It is a very elegant gentleman or lady's scent. It is definitely a unisex perfume. <br />
<br />
When I smell this perfume, I imagine an elegant and rich person. I think the main reason for this association in me is that people who smoke quality cigars are shaped in my mind as a rich and confident prototype. Because Tobacco Vanille smells like a very, very high-quality cigar. However, I witness how closely scent and human perception work.  Because cigars were something that Cuban workers were passionate about before they were discovered by their bosses. <br />
<br />
If you want to smell elegant like a sweet, quality cigar, Tobacco Vanille is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2356284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2356284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356170" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alexxxy9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alexxxy9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2356170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2356170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356092" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 23:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this smells like a spicy root beer float (with vanilla ice cream ofc), beside a crackling campfire — but in a <i>classy</i> way. It's warm, relaxed, comfortably bougie and jovial, if a little bit self-satisfied. <br />
<br />
It leans masculine, but cozy and sweet, with a comforting linearity to it. Like wearing your dad's sweater during movie night as a little kid, and pulling your knees up inside it on the couch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2356092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2356092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355533" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163825">Hay perhumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 11:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My greatest love of all 🖤</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2355533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2355533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355350" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rarixz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2330029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rarixz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2330029">Rarixz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>lana del rey dilf, toxic and intoxicating. Lana del rey romanticizes cigarettes coming to life through a fragrance. Captivating, alluring, who's wearing that? Easy to counter opposite reactions through the smell of the cigarettes, people who are oblivious to the taste of Lana del Rey's lifestyle through her music.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355022" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gs1.a"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gs1.a" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775502">gs1.a</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 01:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10 / 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2355022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2355022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352211" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mcole500"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292897"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2292897.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mcole500" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292897">mcole500</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Immediately impressed. Right away hit with the sweet-ish tobacco. Followed by the emergence of a bitter dried fruitiness note - like dates. Like a combination of mulling spices and tobacco. Delicious, but almost zero vanilla that I had expected.<br />
Fruit fades and the tobacco becomes smokier. Final dry down is a smooth tobacco / wood / vanilla. Lots of competition in this category though, with lots of compelling alternatives given its price</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2352211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2352211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GrumpyAF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758500"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1758500.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GrumpyAF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BORNTOSTANDOUT/Dirty-Rice-78862.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78862.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dirty Rice"title="Dirty Rice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758500">GrumpyAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 09:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of those fragrances (like Aventus and Blanche) that have overwhelmingly positive reviews on Fragrantica but I strongly disliked from the first whiff. I will call this category Personal Ultimate Guilt Trip.  It is somehow exactly like the air freshener I have at home for my room (also tobacco and vanilla) but somehow worse. The vanilla in here is thin and watery like cheap synthetic vanillin. As for tobacco, I feel like in the end it is just my preference, as an only non-smoker in my family. I enjoy an occasional tobacco note in perfume but I guess only when it is not this forward like it is here. When it becomes centerstage it makes the perfume feel somewhat dirty. Tobacco lovers may enjoy it exactly for this reason, but not me. Another tobacco strong perfume like this I had, was Cocaïne by Franck Boclet and remembering that one makes me shudder with disgust. I sprayed TF Tobacco Vanille a few times, hoping that maybe cocoa notes will make me change my mind, but no such luck. Good projection and longevity though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2351991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2351991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351304" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheBestSmellingMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1630361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheBestSmellingMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630361">TheBestSmellingMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like the way this smells. I’ve skin tested many times (like right now). Although I enjoy smelling it, I don’t want to smell like it. It’s IS cozy. I think it’s scent memory for me🩷. Mr Hill  (the neighbor/ boyfriend of my Great Aunt Evelynn) he used to come over for dinner especially Sunday after church. He would sit in the big leather chair and read the Sunday paper and smoke his wooden pipe. I’d be on the floor playing with my toys, coloring or watching T.V. - doing little kid stuff and something like Tobacco Vanille would be in the air.  - it’s a very smooth fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2351304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2351304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2322855">tommzzagoraa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have seen some people have false expectations about this perfume. But it is literally the tobacco leaf with a vanilla base, It kind of smells like a chai tea latte more than pack of vanilla cigarettes. It smells really surprisingly cozy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2348820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2348820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's got a great tobacco and vanilla base, but there was a Vicks VaporRub note that I could not get past to enjoy it. DM me if interested!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2342780"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2342780#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342617" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bellabae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1454344.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bellabae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Sintra-62837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sintra"title="Sintra"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1454344">bellabae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My #1. Smooth spicy vanilla. Sexy, elegant, classy. Not too sweet, not too woody, not too spicy, a truly gorgeous blend. Lasts forever on both skin and clothing. Always a compliment getter. Nothing even comes close to this one. My go to occasion scent. Somehow both bold and soft at the same time. <br />
Although dossiers version of this is pretty damn close! So if you can’t afford the real one I highly suggest dossiers clone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2342617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2342617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
