padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2290891">Dizye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not worth, straight up just smells like a chai latte. Smells nice but do I want to smell like a chai latte? Not the James bond vibe I thought it would carry since he wore it in some bond movies. Goes to show never blind buy and never buy the hype. Try it yourself first always especially given the price tag</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2342510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2342510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342301" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raul Claudiu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687900.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raul Claudiu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Fantasm-93266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Fantasm"title="A*Men Fantasm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687900">Raul Claudiu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see why this was and still is so popular and cloned..it really is a “perfect” smell if such thing exists. The green tobacco leaf,the vanillas,the dried fruits,the cacao are not separate notes,they morph into eachother beautifully creating this cozy aura which keeps u warm and content no matter what. Performance is fantastic too. A benchmark almost 18 years after its release.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2342301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2342301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340864" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DeFraghead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1434113.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DeFraghead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434113">DeFraghead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille: A Rich and Decadent Journey Through Warmth and Spice<br />
<br />
Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille is a fragrance that feels like a sumptuous, tactile experience—a blend of warmth, comfort, and indulgence that invites the wearer into a world of opulence and sensuality. From the first spray, it envelops you in an embrace of rich, smoky sweetness, where the smoky richness of tobacco meets the soft, warm smoothness of vanilla. It is a bold fragrance, but one that is comfortingly familiar, like wrapping yourself in a luxurious, soft throw after a long day.<br />
<br />
The opening of Tobacco Vanille is instantly enveloping. The tobacco is not harsh or overpowering but smooth and velvety, with a slightly smoky, earthy depth that resonates throughout the fragrance. It is balanced beautifully by the sweet, creamy warmth of vanilla, which softens the tobacco’s sharpness and brings a comforting roundness to the composition. Together, these two primary elements create an atmosphere that is both rich and inviting—a kind of opulent, yet intimate warmth.<br />
<br />
As the fragrance evolves, the spice begins to unfold. Notes of cocoa, spices, and dried fruit weave into the composition, adding complexity and depth. The sweetness of vanilla becomes richer, the spices take on a cozy, almost gourmand quality, and the tobacco becomes more rounded, like a smoky leather chair in a grand study. It’s a fragrance that speaks to the senses as much as to the emotions—its warmth invites relaxation and indulgence, while its rich spiciness adds an intriguing, almost mysterious element.<br />
<br />
Despite its warmth, Tobacco Vanille never feels too heavy or cloying. There’s a surprising airiness to it, a sense of elegance and refinement that prevents it from becoming overly sweet or overpowering. The spice is never sharp, but instead lingers softly, like the residue of a great evening spent in good company, where the air is filled with laughter and warmth. The tobacco remains prominent throughout, but it is always balanced by the round, creamy sweetness of vanilla and the rich, smooth complexity of the other ingredients.<br />
<br />
What makes Tobacco Vanille so compelling is its perfect balance of boldness and elegance. It is unapologetically luxurious, yet incredibly wearable. It doesn’t shout for attention; instead, it draws you in slowly, seductively, until you are surrounded by its warmth. It has a certain versatility, too—it works beautifully for both daytime and evening wear, offering a perfect balance of richness and lightness. It can be worn casually, but also exudes a kind of sophistication that makes it ideal for more formal or special occasions.<br />
<br />
In sum, Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille is a fragrance that balances the bold with the refined, the smoky with the sweet, creating an olfactory experience that is as comforting as it is captivating. It feels like the perfect blend of luxury and familiarity, with just enough intrigue to keep you coming back for more. It is a fragrance for those who appreciate warmth, indulgence, and complexity—a sensual, timeless classic that evokes the cozy richness of autumn while remaining elegant and timeless enough to wear year-round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2340864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2340864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340724" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SitooKosit09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872920"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872920.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SitooKosit09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Oud-Palao-Eau-de-Parfum-31738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Palao Eau de Parfum"title="Oud Palao Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872920">SitooKosit09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's the definition of OvErHyPe !!! Its not a  bad scent , but it does not deserve the price nor the popularity . <br />
There are better tobacco fragrances out there , and certainly better vanilla scents . The combination of the two in this one is somehow giving of an unmistakable bitterness , much like what you would get from pouring water over freshly cut tobacco leaf. When you add vanilla i jus get a butter sweetness reminiscent of a herbal medication . <br />
Probably not gonna repurchase !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2340724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2340724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338919" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bingo30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bingo30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398">Bingo30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Still one of the undisputed sweet holiday tobacco kings. Addicting and superb smell to this day. I don't have much to add considering this is one of the most popular fragrances on the website. You probably know what to expect. Tobacco and hot cocoa in just the right amounts.<br />
<br />
I will say I prefer it over some of its contemporaries including Les Indemodables Vanille Havane and Frank Boclet Tobacco. Where the former has too much chocolate powder and not enough of that dark tobacco, and the latter is very nice with the addition of wintry cloves but doesn't have the thick presence that TV brings.<br />
<br />
8.6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2338919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2338919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mint_on_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725171.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mint_on_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Bitter-Peach-62707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bitter Peach"title="Bitter Peach"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725171">mint_on_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 19:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>absolutely wonderful, tom ford has done it again.. on the right skin combination the tobacco and vanilla would show up wonderfully, straight out of the bottle the tobacco is a little strong, but still very nice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2338320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2338320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336505" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaju23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.632507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaju23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632507">kaju23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are cigarettes called Djarum Vanilla, tobacco mixed with ground cloves &amp; delicious vanilla aroma. Well, I quit smoking a long time ago, I assume not many of you are smokers, what I want to say is Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille smells exactly like unlit Djarum Vanilla cigarette.<br />
<br />
Tremendous fragrance - creamy, warm and cozy thanks to vanilla, tonka and cacao, yet little bit spicy thanks to tobacco and woody &amp; spicy notes. <br />
<br />
A high roller in tobacco &amp; vanilla game, a masterclass of it's own. Some will love it, some will hate it, nobody stays neutral.<br />
<br />
Longevity is eternal, especially on clothes. Careful, 2 sprays top, otherwise you'll fill out the olympic pool-sized room</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2336505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2336505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very overpowering, and keeps interrupting every other smell in the room<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frankly B"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773429"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frankly B" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773429">Frankly B</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rotten stuff.  There are so many lovely niche fragrances that have the same basic profile but a million times more depth and interest as this trite, sickening brew. Why not have a spark of originality and look around a bit? You can find the same notes with so much more going on in another fragrance. This is flat and stale in comparison with its niche counterparts. Be bold!  Don’t buy Ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2334488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2334488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333752" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gus2saucy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2020918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gus2saucy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); I don't know it reminds me of the Christmas potlucks that were held in the backroom of the Catholic Church my family used to force me to attend. It doesn't last on me for some reason; people say they can only smell it if they're practically motorboating me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2333752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2333752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333704" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Adorevictoria1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Adorevictoria1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ulyka-Parfums/Nota-Sugar-89202.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89202.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nota Sugar"title="Nota Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137533">Adorevictoria1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think the tobacco + vanilla combo makes it smell like honey. If you don't like tobacco fragrances, this probably isn't for you. At first, the tobacco is like a punch in the face. Tobacco in fragrances always smells like old lady bad breath to my nose. The dry down is where the magic happens. It's like a vanilla cashmere. I can't get pass the fontal leaf I still smell in the background though. It smells so good on my coworker but she mixes it with something super sweet and vanilla. Not that they are comparable but I'd prefer MFK Grand Soir for a elegant vanilla. As a gourmand girlie, I have to give this a 3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2333704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2333704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332648" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFraganist55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029669.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFraganist55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332648ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332648" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 11:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of those "love at first whiff" fragrances. I mean this stuff has everything. Premium quality, smell, and performance. It smells absolutely delectable. But the price... man.<br />
I feel like this doesn't get talked about enough with this fragrance, but there has to be some kind of honey note in it. I guess I'm mistaking the honey smell for another note, but I get pure vanilla, tobacco, and honey from this. Maybe it's the dried fruit note. I can also detect the cacao a lil bit as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2332648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2332648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="passthecranberrysauce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="passthecranberrysauce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No 2"title="Eilish No 2"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962746">passthecranberrysauce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume has no business being this expensive. The longevity is ridiculous (2-3 hours) and after the first hour, the tobacco has totally vanished and what is left is an off-putting smell of Play-Doh. Spend your money on something else.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2329164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2329164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328850" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RaggedyAnn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825313"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1825313.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RaggedyAnn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825313">RaggedyAnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nicely done but not my personal vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2328850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2328850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328618" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AleWoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AleWoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973147">AleWoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille Review<br />
<br />
Overall Rating: 4.6/5<br />
<br />
Scent Profile:<br />
Tom Ford’s Tobacco Vanille is a luxurious, opulent blend that’s rich and comforting. The fragrance opens with a bold tobacco leaf note, balanced beautifully with a sweet and slightly spicy vanilla that sets a warm, inviting tone. This combination immediately feels cozy yet sophisticated, like a smooth, well-aged tobacco that’s softened by creamy vanilla.<br />
<br />
As it develops, warm spices, especially clove and cinnamon, come forward, enhancing the richness and adding a touch of holiday-like warmth to the composition. The heart reveals dried fruit accords that lend a subtle sweetness, rounding out the intensity of the tobacco and vanilla for a perfectly balanced blend. The base notes are a mix of cacao and tonka bean, which further deepen the fragrance with an earthy, slightly chocolatey undertone.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Tobacco Vanille has exceptional longevity and projection, lasting 10+ hours on the skin and leaving a strong sillage that lingers elegantly. It’s a fragrance that draws attention and maintains its presence without being too overpowering. This makes it an ideal choice for colder weather, when its warm profile truly shines.<br />
<br />
Versatility:<br />
This fragrance leans toward colder seasons—perfect for fall and winter wear, and especially suited to evenings or special occasions. With its rich, enveloping profile, Tobacco Vanille is more suited to dressed-up or formal occasions. It can be worn casually, but it’s a fragrance that feels luxurious and works best when you want to make an impression.<br />
<br />
Overall Impression:<br />
Tobacco Vanille is a statement fragrance that’s as classic as it is inviting. With its blend of sweet, spicy, and warm notes, it’s both comforting and bold, perfect for anyone who appreciates high-quality, complex scents. A fantastic choice for those who love warm, gourmand fragrances with depth and character, Tobacco Vanille is a timeless classic in any collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2328618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2328618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tried it on for the first time today and been smelling my arm all day. It’s so sexy, spicy and good. I want to smell this all the time. I’m not sure I can pull it off in my day to day life though or if I should give it to my man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2326113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2326113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114357">larita91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my...how come this smells honey on me? Sweet, balsamic honey with vanilla. No tobacco, no smoke at all. Might be unisex, but for my taste, it leans feminine. Beautiful, warm, thick, sweet fall/winter scent with great sillage (not choking, but strong) and 8-10 hours of longetivity. Love, love, love!<br />
<br />
If you are afraid of the tobacco part - dont be! Give it a try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2325791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2325791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If there’s ever been a perfume that’s the perfect balance of masculine and feminine, a true unisex fragrance, it would be TF Tobacco Vanille. This is good juice. <br />
<br />
Longevity: 11 hours on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2320270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2320270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is classic TF deep and sexy. All the notes are balanced so well nothing sticks out. This can be worn almost any time casual or dressed up. Also one of the best clubbing frags I have gotten so many compliments from this scent. The performance is still great too I get over 10 hours of longevity on skin and it lasts on clothes for days. This is a staple fragrance in my collection it still beats most of the other competition in this scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2319269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2319269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's one of those scents I love on other people but can't seem to like on myself. Everytime I spray it I feel like I spilt chai on myself. It's comforting in the winter for sure, but I'd like it better as a candle I think.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2314493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2314493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Niki18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Niki18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248693">Niki18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This really was a revolutionary fragrance. Honestly its a classic on its own. Best from the house in my opinion.<br />
<br />
The scent itself is very chocolaty/ tobacco that later turns into a nice not overly sweet vanilla with some dried fruits. I definitely think of this as a more masculine scent. The problem with this one is that the market is way too cloyed with Arabic dupes and fakes so therefore the high retail price isn’t justified. If you like the scent and find it on a discount then go for it.<br />
<br />
Edit: longevity is Good for tom ford fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2314113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2314113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312678" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bbykay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2229736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bbykay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gritti/Duchessa-63729.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63729.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Duchessa"title="Duchessa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312678ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312678" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); I blind buy when samples are not an opportunity near me, and I just cannot stop thinking about a specific fragrance, which was the case with this one. <br />
<br />
It's too dark and too solid for my taste. I get a hint of menthol which is a little weird when it's such a warm perfume. I can't say how this comes to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2311943"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2311943#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasiuF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2163883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasiuF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Lira-11801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lira"title="Lira"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163883">JasiuF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 05:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably my favorite fragrance from Tom Ford. If you want to smell rich and sexy during the winter time and get ton of a compliments (ik u buy fragrances for yourself not for compliments but it feels nice to get them) you should definitely go for it. The price point is really expensive but it does match the insane quality that it offers. Longevity and projection are amazing and not offensive (like in  Nasomattos) at the same time. The spicy tobacco mixes perfectly with vanilla and cocoa with a bit of woody fruits in the drydown. I also love tonka thats here despite it usually annoys me (like in arabians tonka) <br />
Overall:<br />
Smell 11/10😍<br />
Projection 9/10 (not offensive)<br />
Longevity 11/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2310995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2310995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307318" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alexandros05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809359"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alexandros05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809359">Alexandros05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful fragrance. A beautiful vanilla covered in spices just absolutely showered in spices with tobacco that runs through it. The old stuff pre 2018 is absolutely stunning this new shit is garbage. They amped up the vanilla and is far to sweet where they cut the dryness and the spices which sucks. But if you can get your hands on a vintage it is stunning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2307318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2307318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="catonmars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1586123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="catonmars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1586123">catonmars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 03:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of those fragrances that changes a lot depending on your skin chemistry. On a test strip, I get a lot of tobacco and barely any vanilla; it's very masculine leaning despite it being called unisex. But on my skin, as a woman, it's a lot sweeter, and I get more vanilla, almost like a chai latte with a lot of spices, still making it masculine-leaning but more gourmand. Overall, it's a beautiful, smooth fragrance with no overbearing notes, and I would recommend this to anyone that appreciates a more dark vintage or jazz aesthetic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2306528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2306528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305525" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="semyonsemyoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="semyonsemyoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624">semyonsemyoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 04:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me it leans more feminine, not just because it's so sweet, just the essence of it. Lost Cherry is definitely on the feminine side, yet I feel less comfortable wearing this.<br />
<br />
Anyway, it's just great. Very memorable. A member of the hall of fame. Very good in every way, expect for the price. Honestly, now there is a pleroma of clones that are just as good. Tobacco Touch by Maison Alhambra (I think now rebranded as Smoky Touch), Al Haramain has one, Emper has one, Fragrance World has multiple. What a time for the clone market!<br />
<br />
Upd: Now I feel very comfortable with it. This DNA is so great...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2305525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2305525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The tobacco does not make you reek of cigars, it's subtle, classy, smooth. On my skin, it dries down to a very warm and sexy vanilla scent that just draws you in. I'd love to see other women wear this. However, it’s one of those perfumes that has such a beautiful sweet dry down that just makes you love that strong opening, almost like a headrush</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301444" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mertcho17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2169607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mertcho17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Madison-Pour-Homme-45884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Madison Pour Homme"title="Madison Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169607">Mertcho17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is truly amazing.<br />
When you smell it for the first time, you literally fall in love with it. Tobacco and vanilla are a perfect combination. As time passes, when you move on to the lower notes, perfect, smooth vanilla welcomes you. its performance is very good. I recommend it to everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2301444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2301444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301184" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259829">Jeremygayfrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 11:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>horrible strong tobacco opening, but an amazing vanilla, earthy, dry down after 30 minutes or so.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2288351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2288351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaelzion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaelzion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282">Jaelzion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille is a rich, complex fragrance that leans heavily into woody and earthy territory. It combines deep, robust vanilla with a pronounced tobacco note, creating a scent that’s both warm and grounded. The vanilla here is less sweet and more earthy, infused with a herbal quality that makes it feel sophisticated and layered.<br />
<br />
The tobacco adds a smoky, slightly spicy dimension, while the overall composition maintains a strong, earthy presence. This fragrance is ideal for those who appreciate a more rugged, herbaceous vanilla rather than a purely sweet, gourmand scent. It’s a bold choice that exudes confidence and warmth, perfect for cooler weather or evening wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2286031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2286031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kivqnc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kivqnc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814351">Kivqnc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Evet benim bu ilk tom ford parfümüm,aslında unisex ve kadınlara yakın bir koku denildi ama ben baharatlar ve tütünün bir kadının üstünde maskülen duracağını düşünüyorum bu yüzden maskülen vanilyalı erkek kokusu,hemde maskülen hoş,sıktığım an iltifat aldım ve tam bir özel yere smokin parfümü,çok hoş ilk başta ağır diye ön yargılı yaklaştım ama değil,kör alıma uygun değil,3 fıstan fazlası bayar,ve tişörtün üstünde 4 gün kalır,koku olarak bakarsak kapağında yeni yapılmış tarçınlı salep gibi kokuyor ama sıkınca bir puro dolabı gibi kokuyor bu muazzam<br />
<br />
Koku 10/10<br />
Yayılım 9/10<br />
Kalıcılık 10/10<br />
Özgünlük8/10<br />
Fiyat 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2283945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2283945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253385">csirip</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 09:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can understand why others like it. In the bottle it smells like vanilla, tobacco (of course...), smokey, a bit powdery, nicely blended. On myself this just feels very choking and I do not want to smell like tobacco smoke. It's better to smell it from afar or on other people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2282607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2282607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellyGuy702"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellyGuy702" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); Didn’t expect to get this from Tobacco Vanille. After about 2 hours, that weird note disappears, and I get the vanilla and tobacco. It’s long lasting and sillage is good. I simply can’t deal with the opening, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2282207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2282207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
