padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795884">MichealVoltaire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the opening of this fragrance is a spicy hyper realistic tabacco that quickly becomes sweeter after a few minutes. It smells exactly as the notes make you expect. the dry down is very much more vanilla than it is tabacco, compared to the opening which is almost entirely tabacco. definitely a love it or hate it fragrance, I get why someone wouldn't like it but personally I love it. perfect autumn and winter scent. overall 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278464" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dezpheum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250018"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250018.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dezpheum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278464ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278464" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250018">Dezpheum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>عطر فاخر وثقيل ، كمية دفئ وافره هذا العطر ، يناسب المدخنين ، وعشاق الملابس الجلديه ، يحكي قصص جلسات وسهرات ليليه في أجزاء بارده نوعا ما ، العطر يناسب رجال الأعمال ، ويناسب الشباب الكلاسي .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2278464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2278464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="avion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1339079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="avion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Arabians-Tonka-57384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arabians Tonka"title="Arabians Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339079">avion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It was around 2012. I was at an airport and as I had a couple of hours to waste, I did what any of us (that reads other people write about perfumes) would do… I went to the duty free shops to smell fragrances. <br />
<br />
I heard of Tom Ford, never had I tried one before though. I was quite young back then. I didn’t have that kind of money back then or that kind of interest in perfumes.<br />
<br />
Tobacco Vanille smells like everything is perfect. You’re out on a Saturday night among friends you’ve known since childhood. Your fiancée is by your side. She is happy and laughing and everything is in slow motion. The red wine is at room temperature and the low lights at the bar shine just enough so you can see laughing tears here and there. You’ve had a great night. You tell your friends that you should do this more often and say your goodbyes. You are walking home. It is a warm autumn night and the streets are lovely at this time of the year. You get home, light up a candle and it starts to rain as soon as you’re comfortable on the couch with your bottle of wine and your favourite show on the tv. You can smell the candle and the chocolate cookies your fiancée made earlier. That is what Tobacco Vanille smells like.<br />
<br />
I bought Tobacco Vanille a couple of years ago. Although not everything is perfect, at least I smell like it. And sometimes, that’s all you need.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2278309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2278309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278050" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C.P.71"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="C.P.71" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220292">C.P.71</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells amazing. But so do room candles.... that's what you will smell like... a delicious room candle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2278050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2278050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276937" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Viblerty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Viblerty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248578">Viblerty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Топ за свои деньги</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2276937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2276937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethan-fragrantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethan-fragrantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973">ethan-fragrantica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tobacco Vanille by Tom Ford:<br />
This reminds me a lot of the new formulations of Spicebomb Extreme by Viktor&amp;Rolf. The tobacco is very realistic and fresh, while the spices mostly consist of nutmeg and cardamom to me. It's a mature scent for those colder months and has quite good performance and longevity. I get something like a woody pine note in this too though I'm yet to be hit with anything sweet. To my nose it's a dry, fresh tobacco and spice scent with very little sweetness, except maybe a smooth tonka but that's about it. It's a nice scent, but I'd say it's somewhat overrated.<br />
<br />
Top notes: Tobacco, nutmeg, cardamom, cinnamon<br />
Middle notes: Tobacco blossom, spices, pine<br />
Base notes: Woods, tobacco, tonka<br />
<br />
Longevity: 4.5/5<br />
Sillage: 4.5/5<br />
Scent: 3/5<br />
Design: 3/5<br />
Gender: Unisex-Masculine<br />
Overall: 3.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2276710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2276710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275394" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brahmsfourth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/13416"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.13416.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brahmsfourth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/13416">Brahmsfourth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first Tom Ford fragrance. It embraces one with a beautiful aura of luxurious vanilla and intoxicating tobacco. This is the balanced blend that Givenchy Pi could have achieved had it not overdone it with the cloying saccharine notes. It is long-lasting and its sillage beckons insistently. Some may find it overpowering, I find it absolutely wonderful.<br />
This beauty was created by expert craftsmanship and masterful intuition.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2275394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2275394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gothflute"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246811"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246811.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gothflute" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246811">gothflute</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perhaps the most overrated fragrance of all time. The tobacco and vanille are masked by a fall air freshener pine smell. Dry down hours after is the only part i enjoyed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2275267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2275267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273304" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GUomo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205893"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205893.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GUomo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Intense-Oud-32743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Oud"title="Intense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); Overrated.<br />
<br />
Scent: 3,5/10<br />
Longetivity: 100/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10<br />
Mass Appeal: 8/10<br />
Compliments: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2273304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2273304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Olivertitus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Olivertitus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182431">Olivertitus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like actual oats and raisins, makes me gag. Perhaps the raisins is the note of tobacco. Despite this, the vanilla is perfect and delicious and the longevity is great. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2271073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2271073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270807" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beesbuzzing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="beesbuzzing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242731">beesbuzzing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 23:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The spice is very strong. Personally did not like this fragrance as it unfortunately gave me and those around me a headache from 2 sprays. <br />
<br />
Very noticeable smell, I was in the airport and saw women spraying perfume in the mirror. When I walked past that same mirror a couple of minutes later, I recognized the smell of which perfume it was almost immediately. The smell stays in the air for a while, and it is very distinctive - not always a good thing. <br />
<br />
Smells like a Christmas fruit cake where someone mistook the 1 cup of flour for 1 cup of nutmeg. Too strong and spiced, but I have never enjoyed heavy masculine spice in fragrances (ex., Spicebomb perfumes have a similar feel as this to me). Personally not a fan but could also be my skin chemistry idk. <br />
<br />
Longevity is insane though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2270807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2270807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270548" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zlumie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1773211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zlumie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773211">zlumie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>tom fords tv was the first designer fragrance i ever blind bought - and boy, did it set standards. for me, this was love at first sniff, and i havent found anything quite like it to this day. its vanilla-y, its spicy, its cozy and comforting, its mysterious - theres just something about the way its blended that makes it smell incredibly unique and expensive. to me, this is one of the few designer fragrances who's price i can get behind because it simply smells elevated, and projection and perfomance are a beast. sad that i can only wear this in fall and winter since its too heavy in warmer seasons, but will pick it up again once fall hits for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2268096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2268096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 04:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, so this is not quite what I was expecting. There is literally loads of spice in the initial spray; nutmeg, cinnamon, and ginger particularly. Then comes the rich, sweet tobacco with an undertone of cacao. It smells, at this point, remarkably like Christmas cake - or maybe just dark dried fruits like dates, figs, and raisins. <br />
<br />
As it settles the vanilla emerges, soft and creamy like ice cream. There’s also a subtle hint of caramel from the tonka, and a woodiness reminiscent of wood shavings that underlies everything. It’s deliciously warm and inviting.<br />
<br />
This would be a perfect winter or Christmas fragrance for any gender, and it both lasts and projects well. Definitely one of the more unique scents I’ve tried recently.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2266763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2266763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Caleb847"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Caleb847" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640">Caleb847</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 20:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply too sweet and tobacco note is bit harsh, it's literally tobacco and vanilla. Though niche, i don't like tobacco scetns and there are dupes like "tobacco touch" that are similar to this scent with lesser value, therfore even tho i like the uniqueness, i don't want it. Longevity is guaranteed, unisex but heavily masculine leaning. Harsh opening with a sweet, woody, and spicy dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2266482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2266482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265937" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Advaitaforever"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Advaitaforever" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Essence-Rare-51691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essence Rare"title="Essence Rare"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224809">Advaitaforever</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A wonderful, festive and addictive fragrance. This conjures images of Christmas Eve in New York ,a delectable fruit pudding, idealistic and opaque clouds of vanilla and an unburnt pipe tobacco .<br />
Although I appreciate this for what it is, as a tobacco lover/addict, it isn't that. If you are a Christmas, dried fruit or vanilla lover then this is undoubtedly the optimal choice for you. But the tobacco is too distant, too subtle and too clouded by sweetness. <br />
<br />
My husband loves it but he does tend to love all Tom Ford scent DNA.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2265937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2265937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Josephjo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1505494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Josephjo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Wataniah/Kayaan-Classic-82472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kayaan Classic"title="Kayaan Classic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505494">Josephjo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1/12/24 : To me this fragrance was revolting, I hated it. No part of me likes it does not grow on me. I do not like it. I did not grow on me. I know I tried the real thing and I know I don’t like it.<br />
<br />
EDIT; 8/30/24<br />
<br />
BUT AFTER MONTHS, OHBOYYY FUCK TOM FORD YUM!<br />
such a nice, thick, heavy, and smoothy blended fragrance, reminds me of Haitian hot chocolate, which is make of coco, star anise, cinnamon and other spices, but christ verrrrry verrrry nice frag, definitely a love or hate type fragrance, no in between. 11/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2265763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2265763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrisivE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrisivE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Parfum-48476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Parfum"title="Gentleman Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191906">chrisivE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tobacco Vanille by Tom Ford opens with a spicy kick that immediately grabs your attention. Notes of cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, and cacao mix with rich tobacco, creating an aroma that’s very reminiscent of fruitcake. It’s warm, comforting, and a bit nostalgic, like the smell of holiday baking.<br />
<br />
As it dries down, a gentle vanilla note starts to emerge—not the intense, sugary kind, but more like a smooth vanilla ice cream. The tonka bean adds a subtle caramel-like sweetness that blends beautifully with the vanilla, making the fragrance even more inviting.<br />
<br />
There’s also a noticeable "sweetness" that comes through, reminiscent of dried fruits—think dates or figs. This sweetness is soft and natural, adding depth without overpowering the other elements.<br />
<br />
Tobacco Vanille has a distinct Christmas fireplace vibe. It could be coming from the woody notes, which remind me of the oak we used to burn when I was younger, giving the scent a subtle smoky undertone. It might also be the combination of spices and tobacco, working together to create that perfect cozy winter night atmosphere. It could also be all of these elements combined, each one highlighting the best qualities of the others, creating a harmonious blend that encapsulates the warmth and comfort of a festive evening by the fire.<br />
<br />
Overall, Tobacco Vanille is a warm, sweet, and slightly smoky fragrance that feels like wrapping yourself in a blanket by the fire on a cold winter evening. It’s a scent that perfectly captures the essence of a festive, cozy night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2265054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2265054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's definitely tobacco and vanilla, but more tobacco than vanilla, at least in the opening. When it dries it's the opposite, more vanilla than Tobacco.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2258773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2258773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257694" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ElNino-7-"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ElNino-7-" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257694ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257694" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95062">ElNino-7-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received a sample of this tonight. First couple of sniffs I was like uggggh, don't like this. Fast forward a few minutes and I can't get enough of it. So much so it's going to be full bottle worthy for this winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2257694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2257694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kencalsuda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2108569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kencalsuda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Cassili-54660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cassili"title="Cassili"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108569">Kencalsuda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 16:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prominent sweetness from the dried fruits and delicious tobacco, cacao, vanilla. Spices and tobacco are dominant in the initial spray, but dry down is very sweet dried fruits mainly. I find the sweetness a bit too much in this, i’d prefer it was more neutral, maybe volume down the tonka. Despite the sweetness it’s still an impeccable scent. I love mixing this with non-sweet ones in the winter. As a woman who wears extremely feminine fragrances, i love this. To me this is truly unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2256662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2256662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255687" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oioldian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="oioldian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210154">oioldian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>spiced cake and christmas, wear when yearning for the holiday season. in the air a sweet leaf, skin-close sweet vanilla with a hint of spice within a few hours, then a vanilla base by the end.<br />
<br />
e: the tobacco makes a larger appearance as time goes on, and the sweetness never falling under submission to the spice can sometimes strike unpleasantly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Longevity is ok for that price 7-9 hours from 7 sprays with moderate sillage and the fregrence its quite universal, its good for cold winter days, date and party. Only thing missing is good price and louder projection <br />
<br />
9/10<br />
<br />
Its still a masterpeace</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2253903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2253903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; That's all I smell, not bad... but loud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2247182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2247182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The marvel of this perfume is while being filled up with massive sweet and warm notes, it's still light and fresh in a way that you can enjoy smelling it for long</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216691">maemae2222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 17:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this. The perfect unisex fragrance imo. Anybody who wears this is automatically like 10x more attractive. It smells so fall to me. It’s so smooth and effortlessly attractive. It reminds me of warm chai, or like a hot tea in early fall mornings. It’s very warm and cozy and sensual. Everytime I smell it I get reminded of nostalgic fall memories. Being in love, it just evokes so many warm and cozy feelings. Very lovely and familiar and romantic. Just soooooo expensive. Not sure if the price is worth it considering there are probably some very close dupes. 😕the dry down notes are such a seductive warm perfect vanilla. So lovely . If I had the money I would buy a full sized bottle though in an instant. I never thought I would like anything from Tom ford or maybe I just hoped I wouldn’t because of the prices but I genuinely loveeee this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236700" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aventus Junkie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1000510.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aventus Junkie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Ombre-Nomade-49755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombre Nomade"title="Ombre Nomade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000510">Aventus Junkie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TV is such a legendary scent that a Lagacy house like Guerlain copied it 16 years later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2236700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2236700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236607" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArmanPRFMS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2156044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArmanPRFMS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2236527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2236527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235664" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="albinerikssonnn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="albinerikssonnn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Bottled-Absolu-96246.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96246.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bottled Absolu"title="Bottled Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302361">albinerikssonnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>7/10, smells more like rooibos vanilla tea than tobacco.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2235664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2235664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Porobear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874308.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Porobear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308">Porobear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 03:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh boy, Tobacco Vanille. One of the most hyped fragrances in fragcom. I went into this expecting the best tobacco fragrance, with a lovely vanilla.<br />
<br />
It's alright. Or at least, the current iteration of it is alright.<br />
<br />
I can definitely see why people like it, and it has grown on me for sure, but it's less Tobacco Vanille than it is Tobacco Honey. It's not a vanilla scent like in Layton or Althair, Mercedes' Club Black or Blessed Baraka, but more akin to the Honey note in Le Male Elixir, Oajan and Chergui. It's very sticky and sweet, almost cloyingly so, and I've had better Tobaccos in Amouage's Royal Tobacco, Naxos and Chergui. My cousin likened this to honeyed cheerios.<br />
<br />
More than that, Tom Ford's prices are ridiculous for the amount that you get. 240~ Euros for a 50 ml is absurd. It's more than I pay for the By Killians, and almost the price of a full-size Parfums de Marly. I can buy three bottles from Serge Lutens or a 100 ml Amouage. It would be okay if Tom Ford were on discounters, but they're not.<br />
<br />
I would love to smell a batch of it in its prime, but as it is right now, I would only recommend it if you've got the money to spare.<br />
<br />
7.5/10. It's pleasant, and the scent kind of grows on you, but consider other options.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2235458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2235458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235404" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="focingy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2201188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="focingy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201188">focingy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 02:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to like this so bad! The smokiness/woodiness definitely steals the show here, so if that’s your cup of tea then you would like this, but I fear it’s not for me. A darker and more masculine scent. Of note is that I only tested it on a blotter, not my skin. However I am open to re-testing it again, perhaps in the fall or winter, which are the seasons I believe this fragrance is best suited to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2235404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2235404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EmilZakaryan924"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EmilZakaryan924" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Pasha-de-Cartier-Parfum-59418.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59418.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pasha de Cartier Parfum"title="Pasha de Cartier Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137868">EmilZakaryan924</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite Private Line Tom Ford fragrances. This is the king of tobacco fragrances, but its price tag makes me think otherwise. Anyways. This starts off with a photorealistic tobacco, some sweetness, vanilla, and fruitiness. Drydown kind of tones down that tobacco and makes it more sweet and vanilic while the tobacco is still prominent. This is absolutely sexy, cozy, warm, seductive and inviting. This is a perfect date night fragrance for the winter, and I could see a man or woman wearing this because it is perfectly unisex. <br />
<br />
Lets talk about performance. This is beast mode on my skin, I got around 8-10 hours with a loud projection leaning unisex. I recommend this mainly for the dead of winter and fall. This is mainly a night time fragrance since it can be a bit polarizing in the day time. Absolutely beautiful.<br />
<br />
Lastly, is it a safe blind buy? Hell yeah it is. If you love tobacco or vanilla scents like this, then this is for you. <br />
<br />
In conclusion:<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Projection: 9/10<br />
<br />
Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille: 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2235318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2235318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2233697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2233697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233606" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F.tamer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F.tamer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zadig-Voltaire/This-Is-Really-Him-89350.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89350.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="This Is Really Him!"title="This Is Really Him!"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206940">F.tamer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me it's the godfather of Tobacco fragrances</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946105">Suzanne loves Perfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 16:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooh la la! <br />
Sexy dark warm tobacco in a good way loads of thick sweet vanilla mingling that makes a unique grown up fragrance for both men and women. <br />
I would never normally buy something this expensive unless it was Chanel or something super boujee. <br />
I'm into this, it's not complex and difficult to figure out what's innthis, it's a simplistic does what it says on the tin type of scent.<br />
I feel cosy and warm when l smell it around me, my cat licks his lips over it too. It has a slight smokiness in it too, it's lovely. I give this sexy little number an 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2229435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2229435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
