padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dillemma56"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dillemma56" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nemat-International/Amber-Eau-De-Parfum-43494.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43494.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Eau De Parfum"title="Amber Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195378">dillemma56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 16:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smelled this at sephora and impulsively bought the travel size (still put me out $70 - yikes!!) but honestly I don't regret it at all, this scent is gorgeous!! I get a smoky spicey chocolately scent, like a spicey hot chocolate, without being too sweet or cloying. truly smells different on everyone, on certain friends it's more tobacco, or straight-up vanilla, on others it's a spiced honey, but it changes noticeably on everyone. this is a lovely warming winter/holiday fragrance, perfect for when you want to feel at once cozy, sophisticated, and sexy. unfortunately will not be repurchasing, as I found a nearly perfect dupe (Oakcha Torrid Day) at a fraction of the price, but saving the last few sprays of my TF bottle for a special occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2226377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2226377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="josephc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="josephc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/L-Immensite-49751.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49751.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Immensité "title="L’Immensité "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384251">josephc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 05:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best Tom Ford to my nose. Whereas one can easily find better alternatives that offer the same vibe as something like Tuscan Leather, Tobacco Vanille remains a best in class tobacco fragrance. I owned a bottle from 6-7 years ago and just acquired a 2024 batch. It’s still very strong, great stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2225073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2225073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elikesfastcars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2118664.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elikesfastcars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2224211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2224211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223822" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223822" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="duchess_dollie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2199066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="duchess_dollie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223822ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223822" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2223822"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2223822#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HurreBurre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2120704"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2120704.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HurreBurre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2120704">HurreBurre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille is a groundbreaking fragrance for its time and to this day. It has inspired countless other fragrances and clones alike. The smell at first is a spicy, in-your-face tobacco, and almost a second later, you get a quick and powerful uppercut of that almost gourmand type of vanilla. It's mature, sweet, loud, and artistic. I can see why many people dislike this fragrance, and I can see why many people love it. It's definitely very mature and not a safe blind buy, but I can now see why this fragrance is a winter and fall staple.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2222736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2222736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220407" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Galateus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196253"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2196253.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Galateus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196253">Galateus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is exactly what you think it is. Just a gold standard combo. Tobacco, vanilla, slightly sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2220407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2220407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maxmiller614"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maxmiller614" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051">Maxmiller614</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 21:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Tom ford at its best. For some this is even a signature scent. <br />
<br />
It’s the perfect balance of bitter and sweet coming together to make something special and unique. This fragrance (for me) is eternal. It lasts so long and it nets so much attention. Tobacco Vanille is world class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2219750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2219750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217665" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EgeBey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1340576.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EgeBey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Grey-Vetiver-6697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Vetiver"title="Grey Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1340576">EgeBey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume really changed man and it saddens me to see it like this. Much like Aventus, newer batches of this sucks big time. Whilst Aventus struggles with performance issues, Tobacco Vanille struggles to compete against its previous formulas. Don’t get me wrong this is not a bad scent however you don’t get the vanilla rich scent you got back in the day and it bums me out. Now all you get is a chocolate like smell or some sh*t like that. I didn’t even recognized the tobacco part last time I tried this. If you can find and afford an older batch, this is a great winter-night fragrance and I would probably rate it 9.25/10 or so.<br />
However at this state it’s a so-so coffee date fragrance that will probably be risky depending on your partner’s taste in perfumes. I CAN’T give a rating more than 5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2217665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2217665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217469" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="houtx_m"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180166"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="houtx_m" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180166">houtx_m</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 09:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With this, I get a very strong honey note. A heavy, tobacco, spicy honey, but honey nonetheless. I feel as if it’s a sweeter, stronger version of Tom Ford Noir Extreme. I love it, but I do feel as if this overemphasis on honey makes the price tag a little too much to ask for. Disregarding the price, it is a great fragrance, perfect for those nights out where you want to feel delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2217469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2217469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Purepotts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1524287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Purepotts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524287">Purepotts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unisex but strongly male leaning. If it wasn’t marketed as unisex, I would not believe that it was intended it be. <br />
<br />
Lightly smoky with tobacco. Very warm and spicy. Smooth vanilla behind the sharper notes. <br />
<br />
Enjoyable but not wearable by everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2216174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2216174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="_hypnotic_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346072"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="_hypnotic_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ikealegs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191589.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ikealegs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12192.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Portofino"title="Neroli Portofino"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191589">Ikealegs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a bit of a sore subject for me as I bought myself a 100ml bottle of it (£270 mind you) and had it stolen from me after owning it for about two weeks lol. From what I can remember, it’s a rich, warm, slightly spicy scent with a pleasant sweet vanilla on the dry down. The tobacco note in it is also quite sweet. Don’t get me wrong, it’s a nice smelling fragrance, but I can’t justify spending that much AGAIN on something that just smells, well, nice. <br />
I will say, I’ve found that turmeric latte from lush smells VERY similar to it, albeit with a bit more of a Smokey note, and is only £60 for a full bottle :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It is my favorite fragrance of all time. To many, this may smell of chai. To me, it reminds me of vanilla rooibos tea. Sweet, rich, warm. One of the only private blends I truly feel is worth its price.<br />
<br />
Well-blended, smooth, high-quality. It's not the most complex, but it smells truly outstanding.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2214876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2214876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214201" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="truthtea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="truthtea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846450">truthtea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With some maceration, this scent got stronger and smelled better than when I first received it. The smell is a classic with the name stating exactly how it smells: tobacco and vanilla. So it is very sweet and lasts a pretty long (7-8 hours) with a soft-medium projection (using 4-6 sprays max). Obviously for the colder weather for going out or formal/special occasions. <br />
<br />
Some people said it smelled like horchata in the air and others say it smells like the scent's namesake. A bit pricey but it shouldn't be the worse when shopping at good name discounters (I got the 30ml/1oz bottle for a little over $100).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2214201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2214201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Would never pay retail for it, but it's good to have if you either just want it in your collection as a dumb reach or nice for a person who is just starting out.<br />
<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212072" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NightwalkDaydream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2188989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NightwalkDaydream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2188989">NightwalkDaydream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pulls way too spicy on me which i was surprised by, overwhelming everything else. Smells like Christmas to me! Very strong and long lasting, which i found as I was trying to scrub it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2212072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2212072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040463">Pick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-05">07/05/24 14:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So at first I was kind of underwhelmed. It smelled like semi sweet cloves and that was it, but with time it started to become more and more complex, at a certain point it kind of started to smell like gingerbread cookies, I actually don't get much tobacco at all.<br />
So within like an hour it was extremely nice, sweet and very complex. If I could describe this cologne in one word it would be well-blended, this just smells high quality and I honestly doubt it's as polarising as people say it is <br />
Also I have to talk about the performance, I sprayed it once like 7 hours ago and it still as strong as it was from the beginning.<br />
<br />
I have to say though, this is not something you have to own. If you don't care as much about the quality of your cologne and instead just want to smell good to most people, this is not your cologne<br />
So it is extremely well blended and pleasant, however especially considering the price, it is not a must have</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2209323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2209323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2208868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2208868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saintauriene"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1482201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1482201.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saintauriene" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2208868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2208868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); This is my all time favorite fragrance! Everything is blended perfectly! Being from the south we have scorching hot Spring/summers so I cant wear this year round. As soon as the temperature drops I make sure I wear this daily! I'm in love with this fragrance. Well Done Tom Ford!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2208868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2208868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smitjat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smitjat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184980">smitjat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-04">07/04/24 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has to be one of my favourite scents. Absolutely love vanilla musky fragrances, and this just hits all the right notes. I bought this due to Penhaligon's pulling their Roaring Radcliffe, which smelt very similar. I would say the Penhaligon one was better at blending the vanilla and tobacco rum smells. The TF version hits you immediately with the vanilla and then the tobacco element comes afterwards calming the sweet scent down. Only snag is the extortionate price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2207935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2207935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="therainman2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2184096.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="therainman2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096">therainman2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been destroyed with reformulations. If you guys want this scent, get Al Haramain Amber Oud Tobacco edition, it is a 95% clone of this fragrance, with much better performance. Yes, this one has better quality vanilla, it is way creamier in the opening, but after like 10 minutes, this and Haramain are 1/1 in the air, no difference at all. And Haramain is a fraction of the price... Sadly this loses bad to it..<br />
<br />
Smell : 9/10<br />
Performance : 4/10<br />
Price : 1/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2207251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2207251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206247" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silverii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151284"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2151284.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silverii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151284">silverii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Already reviewed this, but I smelled this on a customer at work and recognized it immediately. What I smelled when I wore this fragrance is not what it smells like in the air, which is something I should have taken into consideration. It was a pretty hot day, but this fragrance from afar smells very rich and beautiful. The fruit note that was very apparent up close is toned down and a very rich tobacco or licorice smell, which is not smoky and a bit more earthy, comes in during the tail end of a whiff. Very pleasant, I’m impressed it smells this nice out of its prime wearing seasons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2206247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2206247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172446">Erenn_36</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Put on your 1920s pinstripe suit and head to a family reunion. This is the description of this scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2204622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2204622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UrbanBliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UrbanBliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967">UrbanBliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 20:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This beauty is my signature scent. It’s so unique. It’s truly a masterpiece. I use tobacco anything year round. Only time to not wear this is very hot days. Otherwise this is my all time favorite. Sexy, powerful, independent but soft all in one. Gingery and sweet tobacco. Think dark boothy cigar bar with beautiful rich people smoking Cuban cigars and drink cognac. It’s so seductive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2203482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2203482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tigerlilley9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2027611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tigerlilley9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027611">Tigerlilley9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been systematically going through every scent I own and sampling new ones to figure out what I like and don’t like. I’ve really gone down the scent rabbit hole this year. <br />
<br />
I have rotated through at least 70 different scents so far. No one has commented on a scent I’ve worn one way or the other, unless I’ve specifically asked them to, and made them smell me. Not even my family that I live with has commented on anything unsolicited. That is, except for Tobacco Vanille. <br />
<br />
The first time I wore Tobacco Vanille (earlier this year) my 9 year old daughter became obsessed. As soon as she was near me she asked what the amazing smell was and said it was the best thing she’s ever smelled in her life. It started her own obsession with fragrance and she has been collecting samples and exploratory sets ever since. She has asked for a bottle of Tobacco Vanille for her birthday.<br />
<br />
I wore it again for the second time yesterday and when I hugged my older daughter she inhaled deeply and exclaimed, “You smell SOOOOOOOOO gooooood!” She’s 11.<br />
<br />
Make of this information what you will. I for one really do like this scent, even now in the summer. Is it a sign that this is my signature scent, or should I leave this one for the tween set? The journey continues…<br />
<br />
Edit: I don’t smoke. I don’t know anyone who smokes. My children have only ever been exposed to smoking via random strangers smoking outside occasionally and they always say it smells gross. Personally, I don’t think TV smells anything like a cigarette. Still, I was surprised that my kids would like this one so much. I was under the impression it was one of the more challenging and grown-up scents, but what do I know?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2202959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2202959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jezeleah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jezeleah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Trajan-61808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Trajan"title="Trajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428644">Jezeleah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In 2007 when this first came out I thought the rep at Neiman Marcus was insane to give me a huge sample of this. I mean Tobacco? Just a few years prior I was ecstatic when smoking in bars and restaurants was banned, simply because my clothes would no longer reek of cigarettes. Wearing tobacco on purpose just seemed wrong, and I still cannot get over it! Sunshine woman is the only fragrance I’ve ever considered owning, and that has tobacco FLOWER. I’m jaded. I hate that note! I wore that note for years without a choice, now that I have a choice I just don’t care for it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2202456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2202456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200267" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jems14"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178094"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jems14" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178094">Jems14</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got this one and it’s really nice I was a lithe but scared as I heard a lot about the “artificial honey” smell but surprisingly it dries beautifully in my skin, after the first pump I get the honey smell but is not really artificial it’s more floral and creamy like a vanilla cake.<br />
After a few minutes smelling like a cupcake I get the smokiness and a very nice cocoa note it’s warm but no like a fireplace more like a hot cocoa at grandma’s house.<br />
The only bad thing is the lasting, it evolves really quick and when you get the final notes it almost disappears I have to spray it again every 3-4 hours and with the price is a really red flag.<br />
Anyways is the only sweet scent I have and i will be like that for a long time for sure, it’s cozy but with personality</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1825"comment_id="2200267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html?ccid=2200267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
